welcome_message_body: Welcome to Enfield, a charming town known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, sample our delicious cuisine, and soak in the unique atmosphere of our lovely town. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Gökyüzü Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gökyüzü Restaurant is a turkish restaurant located in Harringay.
restaurants.address: 26-27 Grand Parade, Green Lanes, Harringay, Greater London, N4 1LG

restaurants.name: Hala Restaurant
restaurants.description: Hala Restaurant is a turkish restaurant located in London.
restaurants.address: 29-30 Grand Parade (Green Lanes), London, Greater London, N4 1LG

restaurants.name: Diyarbakir Kitchen
restaurants.description: Diyarbakir Kitchen is a turkish restaurant located in London.
restaurants.address: 52-53 Green Lanes, London, Greater London, N4 1AG

restaurants.name: Sodo Pizza Cafe
restaurants.description: Sodo Pizza Cafe is a pizzeria located in London.
restaurants.address: 21 Hatherley Mews, London, Greater London, E17 4QP

restaurants.name: The Gardeners Resturant
restaurants.description: The Gardeners Resturant is a austrian restaurant located in Enfield.
restaurants.address: Cattlegate Road Crews Hill, Enfield, Greater London, EN2 9DP

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights, providing a VIP experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a range of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, London City Airport offers a dedicated terminal with exclusive lounges and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport is a smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by British Airways and some other airlines for short-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by Star Alliance airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by Oneworld airlines for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The third oldest terminal at Heathrow, primarily used by SkyTeam airlines for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, exclusively used by British Airways and Iberia for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited usage for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport primarily serves low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
